meanings.definition: Equipped with a pulley or pulleys.
meanings.sent1: The pulleyed system made lifting the heavy load much easier.
meanings.sent2: The pulleyed machine efficiently moved the materials across the warehouse.
meanings.sent3: The pulleyed contraption looked like a spider with its many legs.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a pulleyed mechanism, smoothly transferring thoughts from one idea to the next.
meanings.sent5: The pulleyed setup was like a well-oiled machine, working seamlessly.

meanings.definition: Operated by means of a pulley or pulleys.
meanings.sent1: The pulleyed elevator slowly ascended to the top floor.
meanings.sent2: The pulleyed curtains were easily opened and closed with a gentle tug.
meanings.sent3: The pulleyed door seemed to have a mind of its own, swinging open unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was a pulleyed instrument, rising and falling with perfect control.
meanings.sent5: The pulleyed mechanism hummed softly as it smoothly lifted the heavy load.
